nodes.pinyin: Wǒ de xuéxiào hěn lǎo, yǒu 50 nián le.
nodes.english: My school is very old; it's been around for 50 years.

nodes.pinyin: Nǐ de gōngsī yǒu jǐ nián le?
nodes.english: How many years has your company been around?

nodes.chinese: 我想学关于饭店的词语。
nodes.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng xué guānyú fàndiàn de cíyǔ.
nodes.english: I want to learn vocabulary about restaurants.

nodes.chinese: 服务员，我们三位，可以坐哪里呢？
nodes.pinyin: Fúwùyuán, wǒmen sān wèi, kěyǐ zuò nǎlǐ ne?
nodes.english: Waiter, there are three of us; where can we sit?

nodes.chinese: 我怎么点菜呢？你帮我一下，谢谢！
nodes.pinyin: Wǒ zěnme diǎn cài ne? Nǐ bāng wǒ yíxià, xièxie!
nodes.english: How do I order? Please help me, thanks!

nodes.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ càidān gěi wǒ kànkan.
nodes.english: Please give me the menu to have a look.

nodes.chinese: 我想打包，请给我打包盒。谢谢。
nodes.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng dǎbāo, qǐng gěi wǒ dǎbāo hé. Xièxie.
nodes.english: I'd like it to go; please give me a takeout box. Thanks.
Waiter, the bill—how much is it?

nodes.pinyin: Wǒ zhǎo bù dào wǒ de shǒujī le.

nodes.english: Let's have a portion of fruit.

nodes.pinyin: Hái yào yī fèn chǎo niángāo / mǐfàn.
nodes.english: Also one order of stir-fried rice cakes / rice.

nodes.chinese: 先这样吧，不够我们再点。
nodes.pinyin: Xiān zhèyàng ba, bú gòu wǒmen zài diǎn.
nodes.english: Let's leave it for now; if it's not enough we'll order more.

nodes.chinese: 请问可以再多给我们两张餐巾纸吗？
nodes.pinyin: Qǐngwèn kěyǐ zài duō gěi wǒmen liǎng zhāng cānjīnzhǐ ma?
nodes.english: Could we have two more napkins?

nodes.chinese: 点完餐后我们已经等了半小时。还有两道菜没来。
nodes.pinyin: Diǎn wán cān hòu wǒmen yǐjīng děng le bàn xiǎoshí. Hái yǒu liǎng dào cài méi lái.
nodes.english: After ordering we've already waited half an hour. Two dishes still haven't come.

nodes.pinyin: Bàoqiàn ràng nǐmen jiǔ děng le.

nodes.english: We don't have time to wait.

nodes.pinyin: Wǒ yào yī bēi zhēnzhū nǎichá.
nodes.english: I'd like a cup of bubble milk tea.
